divs: Sighting DetailsThis did not happen to me it happened to my son and my father inlaw. They were out hunting at my father inlaws duck club out along the San Fransisco bay right next to the Mothball Fleet on Jan 1,2010 it was sometime in the afternoon when my son said he saw an orange glowing cylinder shaped object with three spikes on top come zooming by out of nowhere then kinda hovered for a second then went down he thinks into the water he couldnt see it when it went down he assumes it went into the water of the bay right next to the Fleet the only reason im sending you this email is because we were watching a show on the tv and saw your program about the fayetteville incident and i saw the picture of the UFO and it looked like what my son had described i even did a drawing of it for him to put on his wall because i didnt believe him but i saw your show and now i believe him...
trends: There has been one other sighting in Benicia
There were no other sightings in Benicia on or around January 1st 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
